Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory534.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory122.png', 2: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Palma', 3: 'So... that\'s why you had a brawl with those assholes and left the Clean Zone right under their noses, leaving me to deal with endless "greetings" from my former colleagues in the Purifying Force?', 4: '11'}
{3: 'Having evaded numerous pursuers, you two found the motorcycle Noan had prepared beforehand a few miles away from the Clean Zone and are now racing toward the destination.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "It's best to keep the number of people involved to a minimum. Acting rashly can easily jeopardize Commandant Simon's safety.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: 'What an old-fashioned way to kidnap, and with cliche threats.', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "...I already warned him that trouble was brewing and saw him make some preparations. Things shouldn't have come to this...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "It's likely someone close to him who caught him off guard.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: "Hmph, Lillian's terminal is dead. Either she's been nabbed too, or she's the problem. More likely, it's both.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Jumping to suspect your own teammate right off the bat?', 3: '17'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: "People's hearts can be very unpredictable. It's only logical to suspect the one who would have the most convenience in pulling off such a move.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: 'Besides, she asked me a weird question last month.', 4: '11'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory122.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lillian', 3: 'Captain Palma, if Commandant Simon and Noan are both drowning in a lake, who will you save first?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: "This lake you're talking about, is it near my house?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: 'Yes, I guess?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: "I'll move somewhere else.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory534.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory122.png', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Sounds like a weird joke...', 3: '39', 4: "Aren't you supposed to include yourself in these kinds of questions?", 5: '39'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: "Leaving Lillian aside, I've also received a mission from the Purifying Force to apprehend you.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: 'Taking away their commandant like this, do you think Gray Ravens would go easy on you?', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'You can take the commandant back when you come to apprehend me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: 'Trying to dump your troubles on me again?', 4: '11'}
{2: "Hold on... I've already contacted them.", 3: '44'}
{2: "I told them there's an urgent mission.", 3: '45'}
{2: "Bianca's still out on a mission, so I can't reach her for now.", 3: '47'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: "Even if we could, she wouldn't just let go of everything.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'At least we can get a chance to explain afterward.', 3: '49'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "I'll head over first as requested, but there's still a lot to confirm—Lillian's whereabouts, for example.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "If they have further moves planned, even I can't guarantee Commandant Simon's safety.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Since you've received the mission, why not just come out and lend a hand?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: '(And take the Gray Raven Commandant back with you.)', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Though he makes no sound, you still manage to discern his words by reading his lips.'}

{2: 'Palma', 3: "I told Simon that we wouldn't really click, and that he should've just asked to disband the squad. If he had agreed back then, we wouldn't have gotten dragged into this mess.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: "Those old bones did it on purpose. If they really wanted Dark Aries to bounce back faster, they would've assigned us a more aggressive commandant.", 4: '11'}
{2: "Superficial compliance doesn't work in the long term. Trust him a bit more.", 3: '59'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: "You're telling me to trust and respect someone who, despite being warned beforehand, still fell right into a trap?", 4: '11'}
{2: "You've indeed changed a lot since your squad was first formed.", 3: '61'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: "Considering Dark Aries' current situation, no one's probably gonna come to our rescue.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'But here you are, going out of your way to rescue him anyway.', 3: '63'}
{3: "—Though that's said, could it be possible that Simon neglected such risks?"}
{2: "(No, that can't be the case.)", 3: '66'}
{3: 'Perhaps, he just values the truth over his own safety.'}
{3: 'If all his efforts lead back to the same mistake, to another betrayal by someone he trusted, and to witnessing his squad iterate, he...'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "I can go alone if it's inconvenient for you. I'm the one who caused the trouble this time anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: 'This time... Heh...', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: "I'll find a way to get out, assuming you're not lying or planning to take your hostage to the Ascendants.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: 'Just remember, they\'re still investigating "you" being spotted near the river where the Gray Raven Commandant disappeared.', 4: '11'}
{3: 'While saying that with her teeth clenched in frustration, Palma begins to arrange the weapons she intends to take in front of the camera.'}

{2: 'Palma', 3: 'Actually, the Purifying Force has already caught you hanging around with the Ascendants multiple times. If they hadn\'t given me those "greetings," I wouldn\'t have even known that.', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: 'And you even helped the Ascendants take down a defector transfer depot.', 4: '11'}
{2: 'This could likely be related to unauthorized M.I.N.D. replication.', 3: '76'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: 'Only "likely" is not enough. Before any concrete evidence is found, they have all the reasons to suspect Noan himself rather than some replica being involved.', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: "With this added to the pile, even if someone vouches for him, he won't be able to get away with it. Looks like Dark Aries' downtime is getting extended again.", 4: '11'}
{3: "Palma's voice carries a weighty undertone of suppressed rage."}
{2: 'Palma', 3: 'Just how much longer do we need to wait before taking on actual missions?', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "If I recall correctly, it was you who didn't meet the team coordination criteria in the virtual combat during the last assessment.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Suddenly, a profound silence descends upon the other end of the call.'}
{3: "As the howling winter wind persists, Noan's cape is caught in its grasp, fluttering against your face in the back seat."}
{2: '(Quietly push it down)', 3: '85', 4: '(Ignore it)', 5: '85'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: "Tch, it will only take some practice to fix that, but the mess you're in isn't going to be solved that easily!!", 4: '11'}

{2: 'Palma', 3: 'The higher-ups have made their intentions pretty clear. That specialized frame adaptability of yours is only good for being a lab rat for researchers or attracting thieves with a penchant for stealing.', 4: '11'}

{2: 'Palma', 3: "Instead of waiting for you to get your hands on a new frame that's still up in the air and trying to slip away from surveillance and restrictions, it'd be way faster to just kill that Ascendant.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: 'Can we even get out?', 4: '11'}
{3: 'Having spoken those words, she seems to realize something, her brows furrowing.'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: "So, we've got one more fish to catch?", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "No. We're only going to save Commandant Simon this time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'We need more information before dealing with that Ascendant—at least the whereabouts of his M.I.N.D. replica and the original.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: 'Do as you please. Just make sure to give Simon a pep talk before you kick the bucket, so he can see you off with a smile.', 4: '11'}
{3: 'Palma abruptly cuts off the call.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Glancing at Noan from the back seat, you see his expression unchanged, and he takes a moment to check the wound on your neck again through the rearview mirror.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "...How's your neck?", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's just a shallow cut, and you've already treated it.", 3: '105', 4: "I'm doing fine. The wound on your hand seems much worse though.", 5: '106'}
{3: 'He nods at you, yet a hint of concern still lingers in his expression.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'This is nothing to a Construct.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan, are you planning to confront Lithos on your own?', 3: '108'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'My top priority this time is rescuing Commandant Simon.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Don't change the subject.", 3: '110'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: '...Yes, if I can find an opportunity to do so.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'In your current state, making contact with Lithos will be very dangerous.', 3: '112'}
{2: "You shouldn't leave the Clean Zone again.", 3: '113'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Waiting longer won't make those troublemakers disappear by themselves.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'After all this time in Babylonia, the situation with Dark Aries and myself has only proven one point.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'As long as we stay in the "pen," we can\'t solve the problem from its root.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'It\'s not just about Lithos, but also those helping him find "stable M.I.N.D.s."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "To be honest... I'm a bit fed up.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'In silence, Noan accelerates the motorcycle.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: '...Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'Dark clouds slowly engulf the afternoon sunlight, and the biting wind intensifies.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "You really shouldn't have come out with me.", 4: '1'}
{2: "But I'm very concerned about Simon.", 3: '140', 4: "Without a witness, you'll only end up being wronged.", 5: '140', 6: "I just feel that you won't come back if you leave alone.", 7: '130'}
{2: 'A hunch?', 3: '140', 4: 'From what I know about you.', 5: '140', 6: 'Achoo!', 7: '133'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{3: 'Hearing your sneeze, Noan lets out a sigh and stops the motorcycle in front of some ruins.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Use this to keep yourself warm for now.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He takes out a covering tarp from the storage box and wraps it around you.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "We'll reach our destination before it gets dark. If Captain Palma leaves now, she probably won't have to wait too long for us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: '...I wonder how Commandant Simon is doing right now.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory711.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 3: 'In a cell, Simon finds himself grasping in pain, his mind blurred.'}
{3: '—Just as Noan fears, Bethe is not a person interested only in outcomes.'}
{3: "Before pulling out that fingernail, he had been venting his frustrations with an ice pick in the cell, provoked by Lithos' oppressive control."}
{3: "Had it not been for his lack of interest in young soldiers like Simon, Noan's premonitions of bloodshed would have come true."}
{3: "Before this day arrived, Simon had heeded Noan's warning and played out countless scenarios in his mind, maintaining a vigilant guard against those around him."}
{3: 'But he never suspected his own teammates, let alone Noan, who warned him in the first place.'}
{3: 'However, he lost consciousness after taking the medicine brought by Noan and woke up only to find himself in the current predicament.'}
{3: "That bottle of medicine was safely sealed, and Noan's behavior had been completely normal these days."}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Did someone... secretly switch the medicine...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Or, there is something he never found out.'}
{3: "The moment he glimpses Noan's figure outside the cell, Simon doesn't believe it."}
{3: 'However, the snippets of conversation overheard from those people around the corner have been gradually sowing doubt in his mind.'}
{3: "Is all of this part of their scheme? Or is this Noan's true nature?"}
{3: "The weight of regret, deeply embedded in his memories, constantly reminds him of the latter's possibility."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '11', 3: 'He mutters that name from the past, recalling her face amidst the excruciating pain in his fingertip.', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory122.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: 'While the old Dark Aries disbanded and waited to be restructured, Atiel and Simon were assigned to the same temporary squad.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The two were old acquaintances, so their bond developed faster than that of a typical squad.', 4: '1'}
{3: "With Atiel, it would be unlikely for Dark Aries to get disbanded again, wouldn't it?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'They made a promise to each other—once the mission with the ARU ended, Atiel would submit an official application to join Dark Aries.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: 'Sure, since we get along pretty well.', 4: '1'}
{3: "She said that with a smile, tenderly caressing Simon's back as he vomited."}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: "You think I've got something on my mind? But everyone does, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: "If you really want to know... I'll tell you after the mission ends. How about that?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'But when the mission at hand ended, what awaited him was only news of her betrayal and death.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory216.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Atiel used to be part of the ARU. She joined this mission seeking revenge.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Revenge? You mean... Atiel?', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png'}
{1: '1', 3: "Simon remembered Atiel's radiant smile and the way she joyfully played with children—he had never seen even the slightest hint of darkness in her.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He thought they were good friends, yet he had never been granted the right to know, nor had he noticed anything amiss.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'And so, everything came to an abrupt end on this snowy day, leaving behind regrets for never truly getting to know a friend and devoid of the chance for a proper closure.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory711.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Why has he never been granted the right to know the truth?', 3: '60'}
{3: 'Why has he never been granted the right to know the truth?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory261.png'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Atiel', 3: "We're friends, aren't we?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Before his consciousness completely slipped away, Simon had a dream of winter.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory629.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: 'In that dream, Atiel finally opened up about all her burdens.'}
{3: 'The two walked side by side along the pristine snowfield for a long time. When all the words were spoken, she closed her eyes, a smile gracing her lips.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Atiel', 3: "I can't forget those things, nor do I want to, so no matter what happened, things would end up like this anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: "But that's just how humans work, isn't it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: 'Trapped on different paths by our own memories, manipulated by emotions, and making impulsive decisions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: 'Look, Simon... your teammate is just like you, still trapped in the snow.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory543.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'After nearly 7 hours of driving the old motorcycle, Noan and you finally approach your destination in the evening.'}
{2: 'How in the world did you get this motorcycle?', 3: '241', 4: 'Why use this mode of transportation?', 5: '243'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "It's a secret—let's just say I didn't play it exactly by the book.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I figured... You didn't even hide it in the Clean Zone.", 3: '244'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'My original plan was all about me acting alone... This would suffice.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After Noan parks the old vehicle, Palma sends a comms request again.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory302.png', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Palma', 3: "I found Lillian. She's in a real mess, badly injured.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: 'Still breathing though. Said she saw Simon being taken away, so she ran after them but ended up getting captured somewhere close by.', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: "Tsk, no time to grill an injured person right now. I've sent her to a nearby post. We'll get the details from her later.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: "I'm still an hour away from the location you sent. How about you go ahead first so I can retrieve your dog tag today?", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "I'll die tomorrow instead.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With an abrupt clack, Palma hangs up on him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: "She's warning us not to be too reckless.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'How can you tell?!', 3: '264', 4: 'Is this some encrypted language of Dark Aries?', 5: '264'}
{3: 'The young man waves his hand, indicating that he will explain in detail later.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "But she's right. This is nothing like a regular mission, Commandant. I still think you should go back with Commandant Simon later.", 4: '1'}
{2: "You have companions now. Don't take all the risks by yourself.", 3: '267', 4: "Trust me a bit more, won't you?", 5: '267'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "In that case, let's split up. They won't be happy seeing me come with another person.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alright, but we have to keep the comms on.', 3: '272'}
{3: 'You take out your terminal and send Noan an invitation to an encrypted channel, but he seems hesitant to accept it.'}
{2: 'Communication through this channel is hard to intercept.', 3: '274'}
{2: "The signal is also more stable and won't easily get disrupted.", 3: '275'}
{2: "You're not seriously planning to do something crazy on your own, right?", 3: '277'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Of course not.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Or is it that you can't guarantee nothing crazy will happen?", 3: '280'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: '...Nothing crazy will happen.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The young man lowers his head with a bitter smile, accepting your invitation on his terminal.'}
{2: 'Can I trust your word?', 3: '284', 4: 'You promise?', 5: '284'}
{3: 'With a soft sigh escaping his lips, he reaches into his pocket, takes out an old clockwork firefly, and places it in your hand.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "A little lucky charm. To me, it's as important as my name tag. You see the scratch here? It once saved my life.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "I promise I'll return safely. Give it back to me when you see me again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "In return, you need to be cautious during your investigation. Call me or Gray Raven for help if there's any danger.", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's a deal, then.", 3: '293'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory7.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As the dim sunset falls behind the clouds, taking away with it the remaining light from the surface, Noan sneaks around the recorded address and makes his way into the nearby ruins.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'With the fading light seeping in from outside, he removes the armor encasing his leg, tears open the bionic skin, and hides his terminal inside the mechanical structure.'}
{3: 'Ignoring the warning signals from his pain receptors, he wipes away the leaking vital fluid, carefully reapplies the bionic skin, and attaches the armor back to his leg.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.7', 5: '1'}
{3: 'As the sun finally sets behind the horizon, the lightless ruins are engulfed in an impenetrable darkness.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Hiding himself deeper into the shadows cast by the fragmented walls, Noan stealthily traverses toward the entrance.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "It's getting late. Is he still coming or not?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Just wait, it's not like he's gonna make his fancy entrance in a transport craft. Given their situation, he's probably gotta run all the way here, haha.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Two Constructs and three humans are standing at the entrance, with more figures within the dilapidated building behind them—Noan sees a flickering glimmer from a lighter over there.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "(I can't break through from here.)", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He surveys this base again.'}
{3: 'Given the signs of life around and the number of people present, this place seems to be just a temporary relay station.'}
{3: 'In that case, its internal infrastructure must have been abandoned for a long time and rendered unusable.'}
{3: 'Just as he anticipates, his stay in the shadows turns out to be brief before he sees some movement—a human male emerges from the doorway and heads toward the woods behind the ruined building.'}
{3: 'Clutching his two blades, Noan avoids the sight of others and quietly trails behind.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory536.jpg'}
{3: 'The man makes his way through a thicket and looks around before stopping in front of a big tree.'}
{3: 'The dense vegetation is far from suitable for maintaining stealth, and moving across is bound to create noise.'}
{3: "Noan doesn't intend to mimic a cat's meow to camouflage himself with the comms still on, even though the only other option at hand is less than ideal."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory536.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "He hurls his short sword toward the man. Although its trajectory slightly deviates from Noan's intended target, it still finds its mark at an equally intimidating spot.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "During the brief moment of the man's surprise, Noan swiftly leaps from behind, positioning his Rev Blade across his neck.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Don't make any noise. Hands up.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Completely caught off guard, the man nods hesitantly, his hands swaying at his sides before slowly rising.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Human Male', 3: 'M-my pants...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Though Noan speaks words of understanding, he takes the opportunity only to retrieve the short sword from the tree and disarm the man by confiscating all his weapons.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Human Male', 3: '...What about my pants?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'I have some questions for you.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Human Male', 3: "Seriously? Can't you see I'm in the middle of taking a leak here? Don't you Babylonians have any sense of honor?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Sorry, I used to work in Akdilek's Cargo Crew.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The intimidated man immediately ceases his moral objections.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Human Male', 3: '...What the **** do you want?', 4: '2'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory76.jpg'}
{3: "Everything from Noan's end is transmitted clearly to your ears through the encrypted channel."}
{3: "For those who have lived in safety, they are like Santa Claus bringing gifts—at least, that's what some children said."}
{3: 'But few have asked how they manage to navigate treacherous roads with outdated vehicles and repel Corrupted using nothing but their human strength...'}
{3: "And how they have dealt with Akdilek's infamous internal conflicts, defeated ravenous bandits while safeguarding valuable cargo, and ultimately arrived at their destinations."}
{3: '—At least one thing is certain: conventional combat skills and tactics fall short when it comes to the intricate conflicts among humans. However...'}
{2: '(Is this why he hesitated to have the comms on?)', 3: '366', 4: '(Should I thank him for being gentle when he kidnapped me?)', 5: '366'}
{3: 'You let out a soft sigh, subtly readjust your posture, and persist in inspecting the vicinity of this temporary base.'}
{3: 'Suddenly, a familiar figure slowly emerges around a dim corner.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Quietly following behind, you observe the person at a distance. Just as you speculated...'}
{3: 'Something feels off. The ambiance clearly sounds different on the other end of the comms—Noan is not here.'}
{3: 'As you scrutinize the young Construct who strikingly resembles Noan, you notice his pupils in a somber crimson hue, and unlike Noan, he is not wearing glasses.'}
{3: 'The wound on his chest is constantly seeping vital fluid. Without prompt repairs, even at a gradual pace, it will inevitably lead to his death.'}
{3: 'The Ascendants are still using him. Why would they allow him to be in such a dire state?'}
{3: 'Or is it... precisely because they need to use him, they cannot afford to let their "tool" spiral out of control?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory313.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Meanwhile, Noan, with his sword drawn, compels the man to walk up to the group.', 4: '2'}
{3: "After a brief, unfriendly exchange of words, they quickly recognize each other's needs.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'We can let your commandant go, but you have to stay.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'We owe Mr. Bethe a solid. He wants to see you, and we gotta do right by him.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: "Oh, he wants to see me? So does the Purifying Force. You guys may have known them already, since you both are Lithos' old acquaintances.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'What are you trying to get at?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: "They've also made deals with Lithos, wanting to get some copies of my M.I.N.D.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Aren't you curious about what will happen if they track me down through the locator in me?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The human who appears to be the leader frowns, refraining from offering any response.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: "(Doesn't seem like there's any Ascendant around; otherwise, he wouldn't feel threatened by such a simple bluff.)", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "My request still stands. Let me get Commandant Simon to safety, and don't play any tricks along the way.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Once he leaves, I'll hand over the locator, but if you insist on starting a fight here...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He firmly grasps the trousers of the man in front of him, eliciting a visible shudder of fear.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Human Male', 3: "Boss! He's not lying! I heard him talking to someone else. They'll be here in minutes!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'It takes the leader quite some time to ponder on this clumsy lie.'}
{3: "It's not a matter of lacking intelligence, but rather he knows too well that those people are highly likely to act in that manner."}
{2: '???', 3: 'Alright. Bring the commandant outside.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Nine hours after escaping the Clean Zone, Noan finally reunites with Simon, who seems to be barely holding up.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Under the watchful gazes of many, Noan ties the severed belt of the man into a knot and completes the exchange of hostages.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "I just received a signal from Captain Palma. She'll be here soon.", 4: '1'}
{3: "After assessing Simon's injuries, Noan proceeds to silently apply a treatment gel to his pierced hand and patches it up."}
{2: 'Simon', 3: '...You always carry these things with you.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Because Lillian is better at maintaining Constructs, and I'm the only one on the squad with basic human medical knowledge, so...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Do you also need medical knowledge to carry medicine?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Tell me the truth about that bottle of medicine.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Just as Noan is about to explain, a piercing scream rends the air, echoing from the distance.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'They turn their heads, only to see a familiar figure—Palma is walking over with the heads of two Constructs grasped in her hands, her silhouette outlined against the moonlight.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'He broke the deal! Get them!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: "Wait, she's here for Commandant Simon. I'm still going with you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noan takes a step back, shielding the weapons pointed at them with his body.'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Where are you going?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'You go ahead first and return to the Clean Zone with Captain Palma.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Against the defenses here, the two of you are enough to fight a way out!', 4: '2'}
{3: "Noan shakes his head. Given how desperate these defectors are, Simon won't make it back unscathed if they do so."}
{3: "Moreover, as long as Bethe remains alive, Lithos will soon recreate today's chaos."}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "This won't solve all the problems. You go back first.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He tosses the pistols and daggers he had collected to Simon and takes several steps back, allowing Palma to approach in a peaceful manner.'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: "It's not the first time Dark Aries has encountered something like this. Don't try to solve the problem by leaving with the defectors.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He demands the right to know the truth from Noan, but the young man before him utters words strikingly similar to what Atiel had once said.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "I'll explain everything once I'm back... I promise.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Then, just like Atiel, he walks away without a moment's hesitation."}
{2: 'Palma', 3: 'I knew he would leave.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: 'Noan made his way out by kidnapping the Gray Raven Commandant, saying it was all for your rescue, and now he refuses to come back with us.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Dropping the heads she was holding, Palma shares her most pessimistic speculation—she is no stranger to such occurrences.'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: "I've searched around along the way, but I couldn't find the Gray Raven Commandant nearby.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Palma', 3: "Must've thrown everything behind for the sake of revenge.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: "Noan's doing this... for...", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory216.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: 'Revenge? You mean... Atiel?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The cold wind carries with it memories of the past, their echoes crying out deafeningly in the air.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory313.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Palma', 3: "What's the plan now? While rescuing you is our top priority at the moment, I can still take care of that guy and get his Dark Aries tag back.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: 'Are you saying the Chief... also disappeared?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{3: 'Only now does he appear to regain his senses, stumbling back a few steps.'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'What in the world... should we do now?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory628.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Atiel', 3: 'Are you an idiot?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: "It's simple in this kind of situation—just kill the traitor.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg'}
{3: '—His mind goes blank for a moment.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory313.png'}
{3: 'When his vision clears again, Simon finds himself holding up a gun, its barrel emitting a faint warmth.'}
{3: "Under the moonlight, a mark is left on that familiar face, while one of the defectors walking ahead of him has collapsed, clearly struck by the bullet's impact."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Noan finally turns around, showing Simon a bitter smile.'}
